entries.name: dependencies
entries.desc: The gems required by gem statements in the gem.deps.rb file

entries.name: requires
entries.desc: A Hash containing gem names and files to require from those gems.

entries.name: new(set, path)
entries.desc: Creates a new GemDependencyAPI that will add dependencies to the Gem::RequestSet set based on the dependency API description in path.

entries.name: git_source(name, &callback)
entries.desc: Defines a custom git source that uses name to expand git repositories for use in gems built from git repositories.  You must provide a block that accepts a git repository name for expansion.

entries.name: load()
entries.desc: Loads the gem dependency file and returns self.
